title: Game Crash
body:
I entered a ranked game today and after the game started the game didnt responed... I tryed to quit it or something but i couldnt do nothing. I Even didnt saw my mouse at the desktop when i alt+Tab (I saw it only near the windows sign). So i restarted the computer and then I got leaver buster...
I want to get gold and now i have to wait 20 min for 5 games I dont think thats fair, i have only more 9 days to climb to gold and im on 0 lp after this game and if i will lose i will be demoted to silver 2. that was really bad for me is there any way to cancel that leaverbuster? I really want that skin for maokai.
It never happend to me before..

replies.body:
We **cannot** remove any sort of leaverbuster penalty for any reason. Regardless of intent, disconnecting from a match negatively impacts *everyone* in the match. Additionally, you'll never get a 5-game penalty for disconnecting from a single match and it takes a *consistent trend* of disconnections before you see such a penalty.

If you have any further issues with this, please let me know so we can work together to resolve it. Let me know if you have any questions.
